member.name: T:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource
member.summary: Represents the media playback data of a media session and provides the ability to control its playback.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.MediaSchemaToMediaPlaybackMode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a media schema (or primary class ID) string into the corresponding enumeration.
member.returns: The corresponding enumeration.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.GetMediaObjectInfo
member.summary: Gets the for this session, accurate to the time of the call.
member.returns: A that represents the current media info for this session.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.GetThumbnailStream
member.summary: Gets the stream reference of the thumbnail image associated with this media playback.
member.returns: A that is associated with the media playback's thumbnail image.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.GetMediaPlaybackInfo
member.summary: Gets the for this session, accurate to the time of the call.
member.returns: A that represents the current playback info for this session.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.GetMediaTimelineProperties
member.summary: Gets the instance that represents this sessions timeline state.
member.returns: A that represents the timeline property values.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.GetParentApplicationId
member.summary: Gets the application Id of the source application of the session.
member.returns: The application Id.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.SendMediaPlaybackCommand(NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackCommands)
member.summary: Sends a media playback command to the media session.
member.param: The media playback command to send.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.SendPlaybackPositionChangeRequest(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends a request to the media session to change its playback position to the specified position.
member.param: The requested playback position to seek to.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.SendPlaybackRateChangeRequest(System.Double)
member.summary: Sends a request to the media session to change its playback rate to the requested value.
member.param: The requested playback rate to change to.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.SendRepeatModeChangeRequest(NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackRepeatMode)
member.summary: Sends a request to the media session to change its repeat mode to the requested value.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.MediaPlaybackDataSource.SendShuffleEnabledChangeRequest(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a request to the media session to change its shuffle state to the requested value.
member.param: The requested shuffle state to switch to.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: T:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager
member.summary: Provides access to playback sessions throughout the system that have integrated with SystemMediaTransportControls to provide playback info and allow remote control.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the .

member.name: P:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager.CurrentSession
member.summary: Gets the current session. This is the session that the system believes the user would most likely want to control.
member.returns: The that represents this remote session.

member.name: P:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager.Count
member.summary: Get the total number of sessions.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager.GetSessions
member.summary: Gets all of the available sessions.
member.returns: An array of all available .

member.summary: Sets the next session as current.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager.SetCurrentSession(NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionInfo)
member.summary: Sets the current session. This is the session that the system believes the user would most likely want to control.
member.param: The associated with the corresponding session to set as current.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.name: M:NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionManager.RemoveSession(NPSMLib.NowPlayingSessionInfo)
member.summary: Removes the requested session from the sessions list.
member.param: The associated with the corresponding session to remove.
member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.summary: Finds and returns the associated with a .

member.returns: Bool indicating success.

member.summary: The structure that holds all the playback information about a media session.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating which properties of are valid.

member.remarks: Use this property to assure which properties of are valid before preforming any operation on the corresponding media playback.

member.summary: Gets the starting timestamp of the current media item.
